TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ValidationResult extends System.Object

summary.span: 方法傳回的結果，指出核取的值是否已通過 。

span.span: method that indicates whether the checked value passed the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]資料繫結模型可讓您將與您或物件。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate with your or object. 您可以建立自訂規則，透過子類別化類別，並實作方法。You can create custom rules by subclassing the class and implementing the method. 方法會傳回来報告其選取的值是否為有效的物件。The method returns a object to report whether the checked value is valid. 驗證程序的詳細討論，請參閱 「 資料驗證 」，在[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see "Data Validation" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## Examples 下列範例會將標示為無效，如果它包含非數字的字元或外部的下限與上限輸入的值的驗證規則的實作。The following example shows the implementation of a validation rule that marks the input value as invalid if it contains non-numeric characters or outside the lower and upper bounds. 如果值無效，屬性和屬性傳回之會設定為適當的錯誤訊息和`false`分別。If the value is invalid, the property and the property of the returned are set to the appropriate error message and `false` respectively. 完整的範例，請參閱[How to： 實作繫結驗證](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md)。For the complete example, see [How to: Implement Binding Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md). [!code-csharp[BindValidation#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindValidation/CSharp/AgeRangeRule.cs#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]資料繫結模型可讓您將與您或物件。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate with your or object. 您可以建立自訂規則，透過子類別化類別，並實作方法。You can create custom rules by subclassing the class and implementing the method. 方法會傳回来報告其選取的值是否為有效的物件。The method returns a object to report whether the checked value is valid. 驗證程序的詳細討論，請參閱 「 資料驗證 」，在[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see "Data Validation" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## Examples 下列範例會將標示為無效，如果它包含非數字的字元或外部的下限與上限輸入的值的驗證規則的實作。The following example shows the implementation of a validation rule that marks the input value as invalid if it contains non-numeric characters or outside the lower and upper bounds. 如果值無效，屬性和屬性傳回之會設定為適當的錯誤訊息和`false`分別。If the value is invalid, the property and the property of the returned are set to the appropriate error message and `false` respectively. 完整的範例，請參閱[How to： 實作繫結驗證](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md)。For the complete example, see [How to: Implement Binding Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]資料繫結模型可讓您將與您或物件。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate with your or object. 您可以建立自訂規則，透過子類別化類別，並實作方法。You can create custom rules by subclassing the class and implementing the method. 方法會傳回来報告其選取的值是否為有效的物件。The method returns a object to report whether the checked value is valid. 驗證程序的詳細討論，請參閱 「 資料驗證 」，在[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see "Data Validation" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). ## Examples 下列範例會將標示為無效，如果它包含非數字的字元或外部的下限與上限輸入的值的驗證規則的實作。The following example shows the implementation of a validation rule that marks the input value as invalid if it contains non-numeric characters or outside the lower and upper bounds. 如果值無效，屬性和屬性傳回之會設定為適當的錯誤訊息和`false`分別。If the value is invalid, the property and the property of the returned are set to the appropriate error message and `false` respectively. 完整的範例，請參閱[How to： 實作繫結驗證](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md)。For the complete example, see [How to: Implement Binding Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md).
